Requirement.formula: #program; var buildingName = 'MegaPlayscape'; var pieceNum = 0; var isObstacle = true; var hook = 'Homergeddon_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':SwitchOnLocator')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var returnValue = Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(!returnValue) { var jobName = 'AdultsAssaultMegaPlayscape'; var jobName2 = 'KidsAssaultMegaPlayscape'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledFortHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':SwitchOnLocatorMainFort')); Hook::unload(hook,false); returnValue = Parser::evaluate(compiledFortHook); } return returnValue;

EffectOverlay.formulaRequirement: #program; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'FortifyAssaultAct2')==1)) { return true; } return false;
#program; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'FortifyAssault')==1)) { return true; } return false;

#program; var building = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('MegaPlayscape')); if((Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'FortifyAssault')==0) && (Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'FortifyAssaultAct2')==0) && (Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'Active_Out')==0) && (Object::getVariableAsNumber(building, 'Active_Out_01')==0)) { return true; } return false;

#program; var numPieces = 5; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); if(isNULL(fort)) { return false; } var jobName = 'AssaultRuffianFort'; var locatorNum = 6; var hook = 'Homergeddon_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':IsJobLocatorForPieceValid')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var locatorIsValid = Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(locatorIsValid) { return true; } var pieces = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'Pieces'); var piecesRubble = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'PiecesRubble'); for(var i = 0; i < numPieces; i++) { var built = (pieces & (1<<i)); var rubble = (piecesRubble & (1<<i)); var isLocatorFree = Building::isLocatorFree(fort, 'Pos' + toString(i + 1)); if(built && (rubble == 0) && isLocatorFree ) { return false; } } return true;

#program; var numPieces = 5; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); if(isNULL(fort)) { return false; } var jobName = 'AssaultRuffianFort'; var locatorNum = 7; var hook = 'Homergeddon_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':IsJobLocatorForPieceValid')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var locatorIsValid = Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(locatorIsValid) { return true; } var pieces = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'Pieces'); var piecesRubble = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'PiecesRubble'); for(var i = 0; i < numPieces; i++) { var built = (pieces & (1<<i)); var rubble = (piecesRubble & (1<<i)); var isLocatorFree = Building::isLocatorFree(fort, 'Pos' + toString(i + 1)); if(built && (rubble == 0) && isLocatorFree ) { return false; } } return true;

#program; var numPieces = 5; var fort = Land::getFirstInstanceOfObject(Building::find('RuffianFort')); if(isNULL(fort)) { return false; } var jobName = 'AssaultRuffianFort'; var locatorNum = 6; var hook = 'Homergeddon_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':IsJobLocatorForPieceValid')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var locatorIsValid = Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(locatorIsValid) { return true; } var pieces = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'Pieces'); var piecesRubble = Object::getVariableAsNumber(fort, 'PiecesRubble'); for(var i = 0; i < numPieces; i++) { var built = (pieces & (1<<i)); var rubble = (piecesRubble & (1<<i)); var isLocatorFree = Building::isLocatorFree(fort, 'Pos' + toString(i + 1)); if(built && (rubble == 0) && isLocatorFree ) { return false; } } return true;
